lead_paragraph: Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas plans to pay a rare visit to Jerusalem on Friday to attend the funeral of former Israeli leader Shimon Peres, a Palestinian official said on Thursday.

headline.main: Palestinian President Plans to Attend Funeral of Israel's Peres
headline.print_headline: Palestinian President Plans to Attend Funeral of Israel's Peres
